title: Cotton Fabric
description: Soft, breathable, and versatile fabric made from natural cotton fibers.

title: Silk Fabric
description: Luxurious and smooth fabric produced by silkworms, known for its lustrous appearance.

title: Wool Fabric
description: Warm and insulating fabric derived from the fleece of sheep or other animals like goats (cashmere) or rabbits (angora).

title: Linen Fabric
description: Lightweight and durable fabric made from the flax plant, known for its crisp texture and natural luster.

title: Polyester Fabric
description: Synthetic fabric known for its durability, wrinkle resistance, and quick-drying properties.

title: Rayon Fabric
description: Versatile semi-synthetic fabric made from regenerated cellulose fiber, known for its softness and drape.

title: Velvet Fabric
description: Luxurious fabric with a soft pile, traditionally made from silk but also available in synthetic fibers.

title: Denim Fabric
description: Sturdy cotton twill fabric, typically dyed with indigo, known for its use in durable jeans and casual wear.

title: Chiffon Fabric
description: Lightweight and sheer fabric with a delicate drape, often used in elegant evening wear and formal attire.

title: Flannel Fabric
description: Soft and cozy fabric made from wool, cotton, or synthetic fibers, brushed to create a soft nap.
